===Etymology===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|おや}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=おや}}. Cognate with or derived from {{etyl|ojp|-}} verb {{m|ja|老ゆ|tr=oyu||to become old|pos=modern {{m|ja|老いる}} ''oiru''}}, from the idea of one's {{m|en|elder|elders}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|おや|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR|a=Ja-oya-parent.ogg}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|おや}}

# a [[mother]], a [[father]], a [[parent]] {{qualifier|human or otherwise}}
# the [[originator]] or [[founder]] of a [[school]], [[company]], or other [[organization]]
# the [[boss]] or [[leader]]
# the [[larger]] one of several objects of the same [[kind]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=おや|gambling}} the [[dealer]], the [[banker]]
# one's [[ancestor]]s, one's [[forebear]]s

====Idioms====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|'''親'''の心子知らず|'''おや''' の こころ こ しらず}}: “the child doesn't know the parent's heart” → the child doesn't know the pain they cause their parents
* {{ja-r|'''親'''の光は七光|'''おや''' の ひかり は なな ひかり}}: “a parent's bright light is seven bright lights” → a parent's social standing can be a huge influence on a person as they come into adulthood
{{der-bottom}}
